title: Behind The Idea #7: Halcón Resources Learning To Fly
description:
Has anything changed for oil companies, and for Halcón Resources specifically? That's the topic of this week's Behind The Idea, as we look at Laurentian Research's three-part series -
 https://seekingalpha.com/author/laurentian-research/articles#regular_articles&ticker=hk - to see if the shale-oil company can turn it around. Items covered (with times in the podcast in parentheses) - Halcón's background (1:25), Laurentian Research's case (2:40), How to value HK's land (5:25), The true base rate and second-
